attributes.action: let people with low incomes pay in installments for there pets ashes
attributes.additional_details: i lost my cat poppy two weeks ago suddenly she was 14 years old , i live in a flat and have no garden . i had to leave her body at the vets as i am on a low income and i couldn't afford the £125 they were asking for cremation . so after 14 years of her being part of my family i had to leave her it was so heartbreaking i asked if i could pay weekly they said no this should change .
